attributes.action: Stop foreign nationals entering Britain and being able to claim or be given any form of Social Benefits, Pensions or Housing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Stop foreign nationals entering Britain and being able to claim or be given any form of Benefits, Pensions or Housing.
The British people are suffering because the price of homes has been inflated due to the mass of foreign national in our countries, The national health schools and Pensions are all being eroded because of the mass of foreign nationals being allowed in our countries

rejection.details:
There are lots of petitions on this topic:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=immigrants
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
